name: stop_id
description: Identifies the serviced stop. Multiple routes can use the same stop.

name: trip_id
description: Identifies a trip. Multiple trips can have the same stop

name: stop_sequence
description: Identifies the order of the stops for a particular trip. The values for stop_sequence must increase throughout the trip but do not need to be consecutive.

name: arrival_time
description: Specifies the scheduled arrival time at a specific stop for a specific trip on a route.

name: arrives_next_day
description: Several routes begin before midnight, with service continuing throughout the night. This variable specifies whether arrival_time occurs after midnight the day after the scheduled day.  This is useful for identifying routes that begin one day and end the next day

name: departure_time
description: Specifies the scheduled departure time at a specific stop for a specific trip on a route.

name: departs_next_day
description: Several routes begin before midnight, with service continuing throughout the night. This variable specifies whether departure_time occurs after midnight the day after the scheduled day.  This is useful for identifying routes that begin one day and end the next day

name: dropoff_type
description: Indicates whether riders are dropped off at a stop as part of the normal schedule or whether a drop off at the stop isn't available. Available options:  -  regular -  none -  phone (indicates must phone agency to arrange drop off) -  driver (indicates must coordinate with driver to arrange drop off)

name: exact_timepoint
description: Indicates if the specified arrival and departure times for a stop are strictly adhered to by the transit vehicle, or if they're instead approximate or interpolated times.
